title: Secrets of Money, Banking & Federal Reserve - Collection 8
description:
Secrets of Money, Banking and Federal Reserve - Collection 8:

We have 33 titles here:

-  Apel - Central Banking Systems Compared; the ECB, the Pre-euro Bundesbank, and the Federal Reserve System (2003)

-  Bell - Australia's Money Mandarins; the Reserve Bank and the Politics of Money (2004)

-  Docherty & Viort - Better Banking; Understanding and Addressing the Failures in Risk Management, Governance and Regulation (2014)

-  Fallon - Black Horse Ride; the Inside Story of Lloyds and the Banking Crisis (2015)

-  Farley - Wall Street Wars; the Epic Battles with Washington That Created the Modern Financial System (2015)

-  Fase & Vanthoor - The Federal Reserve System Discussed; a Comparative Analysis (2000)

-  Finel-Honigman & Sotelino - International Banking for a New Century (2015)

-  Goldbach - Global Governance and Regulatory Failure; the Political Economy of Banking (2015)

-  Green - The Secret of Shelter Island; Money and What Matters (2009)

-  Hafer - The Federal Reserve System; an Encyclopedia (2005)

-  Hammond - Banks and Politics in America from the Revolution to the Civil War (1957)

-  Ingham - The Nature of Money (2004)

-  Kay - Other People's Money; Masters of the Universe or Servants of the People (2015)

-  Lindblom et al - Governance, Regulation and Bank Stability (2014)

-  Llewellyn (Ed.) - Reflections on Money (1989)

-  Martin - Money; the Unauthorized Biography (2013)

-  McKinnon - The Unloved Dollar Standard; From Bretton Woods to the Rise of China (2013)

-  Nathan - The New Gold Standard; Rediscovering the Power of Gold to Protect and Grow Wealth (2011)

-  Onaran - Zombie Banks; How Broken Banks and Debtor Nations Are Crippling the Global Economy (2012)

-  Rothbard - The Case for a 100 Percent Gold Dollar (2001)

-  Rothbard - Wall Street, Banks, and American Foreign Policy (1984)

-  Spitzeck et al (Eds.) - Banking with Integrity; the Winners of the Financial Crisis (2012)

-  Subramanian - Bank Fraud; Using Technology to Combat Losses (2014)

-  Toma - Competition and Monopoly in the Federal Reserve System, 1914-1951; a Microeconomic Approach to Monetary History (1997)

-  Triana - The Number That Killed Us; a Story of Modern Banking, Flawed Mathematics, and a Big Financial Crisis (2012)

-  Tyran - Money Illusion and Strategic Complementarity as Causes of Monetary Non-Neutrality (1999)

-  Wang - The Past and Future of International Monetary System; with the Performances of the US Dollar, the Euro and the CNY (2016)

-  Weber & Remer (Eds.) - Social Banks and the Future of Sustainable Finance (2011)

-  Wendt (Ed.) - Responsible Investment Banking (2015)

-  Woelfel - The Dictionary of Banking; Over 5,000 Terms Defined and Explained (1994)

-  Woll - The Power of Inaction; Bank Bailouts in Comparison (2014)

-  Woolley - Monetary Politics; the Federal Reserve and the Politics of Monetary Policy (1984)

-  Yeager - The Fluttering Veil; Essays on Monetary Disequilibrium (1997)
